info.name: Mohamed Housni
info.title: Fullstack Javascript Engineer
info.summary:
I’m a Fullstack JavaScript Engineer with 9 years of experience building and scaling web applications. I specialize in both modern frontend frameworks like React and Angular and backend technologies such as Node.js, Express, and MongoDB.

Over the years, I’ve worked on automating CI/CD pipelines, designing microservices, and improving application performance. I enjoy collaborating with cross-functional teams, tackling legacy code challenges, and creating user-focused solutions that deliver real business impact.

I’m passionate about clean, maintainable code, following best practices like TDD and scalable design patterns, and building software that truly meets user needs while staying technically robust.

projects.title: Dockerized React & Node.js Full-Stack App with Mysql
projects.description: This Docker Compose configuration setup orchestrates multiple services to create a seamless development environment for a todo application. Traefik serves as the reverse proxy, efficiently routing traffic between the backend API, frontend client, and phpMyAdmin interface. The MySQL service is configured with persistent storage, and development-specific settings enable real-time code synchronization and automatic rebuilding of services upon code changes.
projects.tags: Docker, Treafik, Reverse Proxy, Code Sync, Automatic rebuild, phpMyAdmin, Docker Compose, React, Node.js, MySQL, CI/CD, GitHub Actions, Containers, Compose, Dockerfile, Vite, Nodemon, TodoApp

projects.title: Scalable Session Management System with Express, Redis, and Monitoring Tools
projects.description: A scalable and secure session management system built with Express.js and Redis, designed for high-performance applications. This project ensures efficient user authentication, protected routes, and session handling with centralized storage. Enhanced with Docker for containerization and integrated with Prometheus and Grafana for real-time monitoring and performance metrics. Ideal for applications requiring robust scalability and advanced session management capabilities.
projects.tags: nodemon, npm, bcrypt, connect-redis, dotenv, express, express-session, prom-client, redis, redis-info, Node.js, Express.js, Redis, Session Management, Authentication, Authorization, Docker, Prometheus, Grafana, Metrics Monitoring, Persistence, RDB, AOF

projects.title: CI/CD Automation with Jenkins
projects.description: Automated builds, tests, and deployments using Jenkins to reduce manual errors and improve release reliability.

projects.title: Redis Checkin Social App
projects.description: The project involves developing a social network application where users can 'check in' at various locations and provide star ratings (0 to 5) based on their experiences. The application leverages Redis as both a data store and a cache to manage data efficiently. The core entities in the application are Users, Locations, and Checkins, each mapped to Redis data types for optimal storage and retrieval. The application will also include an API to interact with the data and support asynchronous processing for real-time updates.
projects.tags: ioredis, Redis JSON, Docker, Node, Redis Streams, Redis Pub/Sub, Redis Data Types, Social Network, Checkin, Ratings, API, Asynchronous Processing, Real-Time Updates, Data Storage, Data Retrieval, Cache, Data Store

projects.title: High-Throughput Microservice with RabbitMQ
projects.description: Used RabbitMQ to decouple services, enabling scalable message-driven architecture for a high-traffic application.
projects.tags: Microservices, RabbitMQ, Message Queues, Scalability, High Traffic

projects.title: Debounce Demo: Prevent Excessive API Calls on Button Clicks
projects.description: A minimal app that showcases debouncing to stop multiple API calls when a button is rapidly clicked. Once clicking pauses, a single API request is made, reducing server load and boosting performance.
projects.tags: Debounce, API Calls, Performance, JavaScript, Optimization

projects.title: Frontend Migration with React Hooks
projects.description: Modernized a legacy React codebase by transitioning to hooks, improving performance and simplifying state management.
projects.tags: React, React Hooks, Frontend, Modernization, State Management

projects.title: TaskFlow: A Full-Stack Angular & Node.js Todo App
projects.description: TaskFlow is a full-stack Todo app featuring an intuitive Angular-powered UI, a Node.js backend with RESTful APIs, real-time updates via WebSockets, and secure authentication. It's Dockerized for seamless deployment and includes an analytics dashboard for productivity tracking.

projects.title: Improving Codebase Readability and Performance
projects.description: Refactored a large codebase, introduced linting and TDD practices, resulting in better maintainability and fewer bugs.
projects.tags: Refactoring, Code Quality, Linting, TDD, Maintainability

projects.title: Backward Compatibility with Babel and Webpack
projects.description: Ensured modern JavaScript worked seamlessly across older browsers by configuring Babel and Webpack.
projects.tags: JavaScript, Babel, Webpack, Compatibility, Browser Support

projects.title: Deploy a GitHub Repo to cPanel with GitHub Actions
projects.description: Created an automated CI/CD pipeline to deploy updates from GitHub to cPanel, reducing deployment time and errors.
projects.tags: CI/CD, GitHub Actions, cPanel, Automation, Deployment

projects.title: OpnForm Open-Source Form Builder
projects.description: Built a user-friendly, extensible form builder with no-code and developer-focused features.
projects.tags: Open Source, Form Builder, No Code, Extensibility, Community

projects.title: E-Commerce Website with Angular and Node.js
projects.description: E-commerce platform that integrates both front-end and back-end development tasks. On the front-end, it features product listing, shopping cart functionalities, a contact form, pagination, filtering, and product quantity adjustments. The back-end is built using Node.js/Express, and includes API development with CRUD operations, JWT-based user authentication, and management of shopping carts and wishlists.
projects.tags: E-Commerce, Angular, Node.js, RxJS, Postman, JWT Authentication, CRUD, API, Express, Shopping Cart, Wishlist, Pagination, Filtering, Contact Form, Front-End, Back-End, Full-Stack, PrimeNG, Observables, Reactive Programming, Signals, Events, Data Flow, State Management, Typescript, Dependency Injection

Master.degree: MSc in Science et Technologies du Logiciel
